A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: WARNING NOTICE - RT does not count any rating below 1 star calling it \"excessive\"\, so remember - the lowest real rating is 1 star! \n\nAs for the movie - it was a postmodernist social justice nightmare. It's a mix of character\, universe-changing plot holes\, of destroyed potential\, of idiotic Mary Sues and moronic villains. This movie broke Star Wars finally once and for all. There is no going back from this unless someone does a reboot of Episode 7 and starts fresh. Star Wars is dead so long as the White Slavers of Disney are owning it.
